articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Opera "Evgeni Onegin"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Opera "Evgeni Onegin"
						
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed the performance of opera "Evgeni Onegin" on Friday on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the conclusion of the DPRK-Russia treaty of friendship, good neighborliness and cooperation.
					 Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory has reproduced this opera of Russia, which was put on the stage in 1958, as required by the new century.
					
					 Kim Jong Il highly praised the teachers and students of the conservatory for having produced the good opera of high artistry with the innovative eye of the new century and creative way and work style dating back to the 1970s, and gave thanks to them.
					
					 It is a great success that young students of the conservatory have smoothly carried out the difficult task for reproducing a foreign classical opera by fully displaying their artistic skills as high as the professionals', he said, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the Juche art has been given steady continuity.
					
					 Noting that "Evgeni Onegin", a classical opera of Russia, is still of realistic significance, he stressed the need to make a large number of people to come including youths watch the opera.
					
					 He said that the Korean people, who are dynamically advancing toward the world with high national pride and honor of having such world-famous cultural assets as the five revolutionary operas and being members of a soon-to-be-built great prosperous and powerful nation, should get better understanding of the world culture. Then he advanced the important tasks that would serve as guidelines in further developing the Juche art.
					
					 The audience included Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC and first deputy director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, and other commanding officers of the army, Secretaries Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam, Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek and Kim Yang Gon and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee and Kang Sok Ju, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs.
					
					 Among them were also Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and diplomats of his embassy.

articles.title: DPRK Decides to Release American Trespasser
articles.content:
DPRK Decides to Release American Trespasser
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- As already reported, the relevant organ of the DPRK conducted an investigation into Robert Park, an American national who was caught for trespassing on the northern border of the DPRK.
					 According to the results of the investigation, he trespassed on the border due to his wrong understanding of the DPRK.
					
					 The relevant organ of the DPRK decided to leniently forgive and release him, taking his admission and sincere repentance of his wrong doings into consideration.

articles.title: American Trespasser Interviewed
articles.content:
American Trespasser Interviewed
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- As already reported, American national Robert Park was detained for trespassing on the northern border of the DPRK in December last year.
					 He was interviewed by KCNA at his proposal while he was under investigation by the relevant organ of the DPRK.
					
					 At the interview, he said that he was taken in by the false rumor spread by the West and committed a criminal act in the end. 
					
					 He went on to say:
					
					  I trespassed on the border due to my wrong understanding of the DPRK caused by the false propaganda made by the West to tarnish its image.
					
					 The West is massively feeding "Children of Secret State", "Seoul Train" and other documentary videos with stories about non-existent "human rights abuses" and "mass killings" in the DPRK and "unbearable sufferings" of its Christians and the like.
					
					 This false propaganda prompted me, a Christian, to entertain a biased view on the DPRK.
					
					 So I didn't know what to do at that time. I just prayed and fasted and that was my initial response, but year by year more news reports, international media reports came and there were more videos saying the same thing, in fact, saying that it was getting worse, and so that's why I started to become more and more distraught. If there are people in concentration camps, if Christians are dying like this, if there is starvation I have to die with them. If I help them I would go to Heaven but if I don't help them I would go to Hell.
					
					 At last I made up my mind to go to the DPRK.
					
					 Upon trespassing on the border, I thought I would be either shot to death by soldiers or thrown behind bars, prompted by Americans' false propaganda about the DPRK.
					
					 However, the moment I trespassed on the border, the attitude of soldiers toward the trespasser made me change my mind. 
					
					 Not only service personnel but all those I met in the DPRK treated me in a kind and gentlemanly manner and protected my rights.
					
					 I have never seen such kind and generous people.
					
					 People have been incredibly kind and generous here to me, very concerned for my physical health as never before in my life. I mean, my family, of course, is concerned about my physical health but people here have been constantly concerned and I'm very thankful for their love.
					
					 Another shocking fact I experienced during my stay in the DPRK is that the religious freedom is fully ensured in the DPRK, a reality different from what is claimed by the West.
					
					 Being a devout Christian, I thought such things as praying are unimaginable in the DPRK due to the suppression of religion.
					
					 I, however, gradually became aware that I was wrong.
					
					 Everybody neither regarded praying as something unusual nor disturbed it. I was provided with conditions for praying everyday as I wished. 
					
					 What astonished me more was that a bible was returned to me.
					
					 This fact alone convinced me that the religious freedom is fully ensured in the DPRK.
					
					 I came to have stronger belief as I had an opportunity to attend the service in the Pongsu Church in Pyongyang.
					
					 I worshipped and there, there was the Jondosa, there, there was a pastor, there was a choir, they knew the hymns, they knew the word of God. That's why I was completely amazed. But I began to weep and weep in the Christian service because I learned that there are churches and Christians such as Pongsu Kyohoe (Church) in different cities and regions all throughout the DPRK. They worship, pray and preach freely the word of the Bible and Christ word. I've learned that in the DPRK people can read and believe whatever they want, whenever they want, wherever they want, that there's complete religious freedom for all people everywhere throughout the DPRK.
					
					 What I have seen and heard in the DPRK convinced me that I misunderstood it. So I seriously repented of the wrong I committed, taken in by the West's false propaganda.
					
					 I would not have committed such crime if I had known that the DPRK respects the rights of all the people and guarantees their freedom and they enjoy a happy and stable life.
					
					 I have felt shock, embarrassment, shame. Here I'm in the lands where people respect human rights and, not just respecting human rights, they have actually loved me and showed me more than just human rights. They have shown me grace. I repent and ask for forgiveness to the DPRK for my misunderstanding totally DPRK's reality and my criminal illegal behavior. Had I known the reality of the DPRK, what I've learned here, what I have been shown here, what I've been taught here, what I've been informed here by all the kind people here about the DPRK, I would have never done what I did on the December 25th and I repent and I'm very sorry.
					
					 Prompted by my desire to redeem the crime I committed against the government of the DPRK, I would make every effort to let those who misunderstand the DPRK properly know what I experienced here so they may have a correct understanding of it.
					
					 He, as a Christian, expressed his will to earnestly pray so reunification may be achieved and peace settle on the Korean Peninsula as early as possible.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held
						
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on immortal leadership exploits of General Secretary Kim Jong Il for deeply grasping them was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday.
					 It was attended by Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of party and administrative organs and working people's organizations in Pyongyang and local areas and officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, media and party cadre-training institutions and the preservation of revolutionary and historic relics.
					
					 Presented at the seminar were papers profoundly explaining and proving the great leadership provided by Kim Jong Il to glorify last year as one to be specially recorded in the history of building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 The speakers said that he performed immortal exploits by giving free rein to the mental power of all the service personnel and people with his extraordinary political caliber and thereby bringing about a great leap forward and making the waves of the movement for pushing back the frontiers of science sweep the whole country.
					
					 The leadership mode based on field guidance which was created by  President Kim Il Sung and whose practical example was set by him is now being successfully applied on a new higher stage through Kim Jong Il's forced march of high intensity and serves as a main source of all miracles, they stressed, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il has bolstered up the revolutionary army, placing the DPRK on a status of the strongest power which no formidable enemy dares invade, and provided a sure guarantee for the Korean people's advance for a great surge with military strength. And he has placed the servicepersons on the first-line for building a thriving nation and encouraged them to create the "Huichon speed", a new speed of advance racing against the time.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is a great master of leadership as he has brought about a great heyday of the Songun revolutionary culture which encourages all the service personnel and people to vigorously wage a general offensive and a peerless statesman who demonstrated the dignity of Songun Korea and its power under the uplifted banner of independence.
					
					 They called for deeply grasping the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il and glorifying them and bringing about a landmark turn in improving the people's standard of living this year marking the 65th founding anniversary of the WPK.

articles.title: Study Tour for Kim Jong Il's Birthplace Starts
articles.content:
Study Tour for Kim Jong Il's Birthplace Starts
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- School youth and children from across the country started a study tour of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan secret camp on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The meeting for starting the march took place in front of the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo Memorial Tower in Hyesan, Ryanggang Province on Feb. 4.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and flowers before the statue of President Kim Il Sung standing at the tower and paid tribute to him.
					
					 A reporter and speakers at the meeting vowed to earnestly learn from the fighting spirit displayed by the anti-Japanese forerunners in devotedly defending the headquarters of the revolution in order to become the first line death-defying corps protecting Kim Jong Il politically and ideologically and with their lives and staunch fighters translating his plan to build a thriving nation into reality.
					
					 They called upon the school youth and children to deeply grasp the greatness of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and the history of the Songun revolution which the revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites bear witness to and firmly arm themselves with the Juche idea, the Songun idea of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, the study tour group started its march.

articles.title: 1,000-ri Journey Study Group Visit Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
1,000-ri Journey Study Group Visit Revolutionary Site
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- School youth and children from across the country participating in the study tour for tracing the course of the 1,000-ri journey for national liberation visited the Phophyong Revolutionary Site on February 4 on the occasion of the 85th anniversary of the 1,000-ri journey for national liberation made by President Kim Il Sung and the 35th anniversary of the study tour to trace its course initiated by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Phophyong is associated with the immortal exploits performed by the President and the great footprints of members of his revolutionary family in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They went round the Phophyong Ferry which tells the story about the historical day the President crossed the River Amnok.
					
					 They also visited the Monument to the "Song of the River Amnok", the Phophyong Church, the Evening School Run in the House of the man from Hamgyong Province, the Phophyong Noodle House, the Phophyong Police Substation, Apgang Inn and other places. Then they looked round historic relics and materials on display in the Phophyong Revolutionary Museum.

articles.title: Wrestlers Prove Successful in Int'l Games
articles.content:
Wrestlers Prove Successful in Int'l Games
						
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK wrestlers proved successful in the FILA Golden Grand Prix held in Russia.
					 Yang Kyong Il, who came first in the 2009 World Wrestling Championships and the 2009 Asian Wrestling Championships, bagged a gold medal in the 55kg men's freestyle wrestling event.
					
					 So Sim Hyang won a silver medal in the 48kg women's wrestling match while Han Kum Ok carried off a bronze medal in the 51kg women's wrestling event. 
					
					 The games held from January 29 to 31 brought together at least 380 wrestlers from more than 20 countries including the DPRK, Russia, Kazakhstan, Mongolia, Turkey, Ukraine, the U.S. and Japan.

articles.title: Technical Inventions Introduced into Production
articles.content:
Technical Inventions Introduced into Productiona
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Earnest efforts have been made to bring science and technology close to production in machine industry in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In recent years, hundreds of technical inventions have been introduced into production at machine-building factories and enterprises.
					
					 The Taean Heavy Machine Complex has adopted a new technology to increase the modulus of turbine by 0.4 percent, while economizing several dozen tons of materials such as copper, silicon sheet steel and electric transformer oil.
					
					 The Rakwon Machine Complex has made scores of devices needed to expand the service span of hydraulic pump by 60 percent or more.
					
					 The Ryongsong Machine Complex has invented new models of planing machine and screw-cutting lathe for the purpose of making precision compressor accessories and raising the processing speed as much as tens of times.
					
					 Similar successes have been made at the Ranam Coal Mining Machine Complex, the Pyongyang 326 Electric Wire Factory, the Kusong Machine-tool Factory and so on, so that their production processes have been updated.

articles.title: Adapted Trees Propagated
articles.content:
Adapted Trees Propagated
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The Central Botanical Garden has adapted winter ornamental plants to the climatic and soil conditions of different parts of Korea. 
					 Among them is Benzoin angustifolium var. glabrum, a tree keeping its own peculiarity even in winter.
					
					 The cold-resistant tree, some five meters high, has its leaves swaying slightly even without wind.
					
					 It has oval leaves and short leafstalks. The leaves are replaced with new ones in May and June.
					
					 Its light yellow flowers bloom in groups from axillaries around May, forming an umbrella-shape inflorescence. Its round fruits, the diameter of which is about 5mm, ripen in September and October. The tree is propagated by both seed and cutting. 
					
					 The tree has already been planted in parks, recreation grounds and streets throughout the country.

articles.title: Up-and-coming Footballer
articles.content:
Up-and-coming Footballer
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The national football team of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, qualified for the 2010 FIFA World Cup, embraces a lot of competent players.
					Typical of them is Hong Yong Jo, famous for many scores he has made in international and local tournaments.
					
					He, who has been interested in sports, especially football, from primary school days, is characterized by running fast, dribbling well, taking scoring positions in time and skillfully getting goals.
					
					He has been active as a forward in many international tournaments.
					
					He fully demonstrated his skill by scoring three goals in the home-and-home matches with Jordan at the third-phase preliminaries of the Asian region for the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
					
					Hong, captain of the national team, was crowned with the title of People's Athlete last year.

articles.title: Defending Peace Called for
articles.content:
Defending Peace Called for
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Defending peace serves as the banner of struggle that should be held high by the people of the DPRK to build a thriving socialist nation and by the world progressives to build a new independent world. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The struggle for peace is not an issue pertaining to an individual country and people but a task common to all the countries and peoples desirous of a new independent world. 
					
					 Preserving peace is a strategic task to be consistently carried out by people without a moment's negligence to build a new independent world. 
					
					 What is important here is to oppose a war. 
					
					 It is important requirements for defending peace at present to fight against the imperialists' blockade, sanctions and military blackmail against sovereign states. 
					
					 The progressives in their efforts to build a new independent society and a new world should regard the imperialists' unjust interference in the internal affairs, sanctions and pressure as serious operations preceding military invasion and frustrate all those moves. 
					
					 The members of the international community should refrain from such acts as tolerating or helping the imperialists' moves to apply sanctions and blockade against independent countries and put pressure on them. To join the imperialists' moves of sanctions and blockade for their immediate selfish purpose will lead them to ruining themselves. 
					
					 No illusion should be harbored about the imperialists but decisive countermeasure be taken to deal with their war provocation moves. A country exposed to more threat of aggression by the imperialists should direct particular efforts into increasing national defence capability. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will increase the national capacity for self-defence in every way under the uplifted banner of Songun to defend peace on the Korean Peninsula and dynamically accelerate the building of a thriving socialist nation and thus make positive contributions to building an independent new world, the desire and wish of humankind, the article concludes.

articles.title: All Koreans Called Upon to Work for Reunification
articles.content:
All Koreans Called Upon to Work for Reunification
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- No force on earth can block the way of achieving the cause of national reunification making a dynamic advance thanks to the great patriotic enthusiasm and active struggle of all Koreans aspiring after reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 National reunification presents itself as the most important issue related to the existence and prospect of the Koreans and their supreme task which should be fulfilled without fail.
					
					 The Koreans' on-going struggle for national reunification is a patriotic one to rid the nation of its misfortune and the danger of a war and pave the way for its independent development and prosperity. Every Korean should fully display his patriotic spirit in this sacred struggle.
					
					 All Koreans at home and abroad are intensifying the movement for independent reunification, fully backing the spirit of the historic June 15 joint declaration which calls for independently solving the issue of national reunification by their concerted efforts.
					
					 Whoever wishes to see national reconciliation and unity should turn out in the struggle against the traitors to the nation standing in the way of independent reunification in league with foreign forces.
					
					 Trials and difficulties are lying in the way of the movement for national reunification due to the moves of the separatists at home and abroad. However, the Koreans' desire and will for reunification have not waned but grown stronger.
					
					 No moves against reunification can ever dampen the above-said desire and will. The desperate efforts of the separatist forces to block the advance of the June 15 era of reunification would get them to nowhere.

articles.title: Suppression of DLP Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of DLP Denounced in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- The Democratic Labor Party of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on Jan. 30 condemning the puppet authorities' suppression.
					 The speakers at the meeting accused the police of summoning more than 290 persons recently for investigation, claiming it confirmed the fact that members of the Teachers Trade Union and the Trade Union of Government Officials had paid political funds to the above-said party after joining it. 
					
					 They charged that this action was the present regime's premeditated suppression of the opposition party aimed at throwing it into a tight corner in the run-up to the "election to the local self-governing bodies".
					
					 Disclosing the shocking fact that the police illegally hacked the Internet site of the DLP, in particular, in a bid to investigate various information about its activities, they declared such practice was absolutely intolerable.
					
					  They demanded the authorities give up at once the despicable plots and politically motivated investigation to destroy a progressive political party.

articles.title: Koreans in China Call for Decisive Phase in Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in China Call for Decisive Phase in Reunification
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- All the fellow countrymen should turn out in a nationwide struggle for meeting all challenges of the anti-reunification forces by their concerted efforts under the uplifted banner of the north-south joint declaration.
					 The Chinese Regional Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration said this in a statement issued on January 30.
					
					 Every Korean who truly loves the country and the nation and desires peace and reunification can never turn his face away from this just patriotic struggle, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The Chinese Regional Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration will boost the solidarity and alliance with the patriotic forces at home and abroad centered on June 15 All-Korean Committee, guided by the idea of "By our nation itself" and extend full support and solidarity to the people from all walks of life in south Korea in their just struggle for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 We will all come out in the nationwide grand march for reunification to successfully decorate this year marking the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as a year of change for bringing about a decisive phase in the movement for national reunification.

articles.title: Personality of Kim Il Sung Praised by Italian
articles.content:
Personality of Kim Il Sung Praised by Italian
						
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Development Bank of the Mediterranean and chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, highly praised the personality of President Kim Il Sung as a great man.
					 In an interview with a reporter of the Radio Audio TV Broadcasting of Italy on Jan. 27, he said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the Korean people, was the leader of the people who devoted all his life only to their interests.
					
					 He was a true example of human love as he did everything for freedom and happiness of the people.
					
					  He received me and my mother several times and gave precious teachings that man's life should be for society and the collective, his country and people.
					
					 My mother regarded his teachings as a motto of her whole life.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Mexico
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- Mexican organizations released bulletins carrying pictures of General Secretary Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism carried on the 35th issue of its bulletin articles of several titles under the blockletter title of "Spirit of Leader Kim Jong Il".
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Snowstorm of Mt. Paektu" said that the figure of Kim Jong Il majestically standing on the top of Mt. Paektu to look down at high mountains is identical to the spirit of mysterious and impressive Mt. Paektu.
					
					 In another article the bulletin noted that in 1993 Kim Jong Il proclaimed a semi-war state to the whole country, all the people and the entire army and thus brought the United States to its knees before the Korean people. This was a demonstration of the spirit of Kim Jong Il who would return the toughest action for hard-line action to mercilessly smash the imperialists' highhanded practices, it stressed.
					
					 The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea published the 50th issue of its bulletin headlined "Personality of Popular Leader". The bulletin carried several anecdotes about Kim Jong Il's popular personality under such titles as "Delayed performance time" and "Giving name to baby to be born ".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Mexico
Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Establishing the Juche Outlook on the Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Workers' Party of Mexico Publishing House on January 29.
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 76 (1987), clarifies the essence and contents of the Juche outlook on the revolution and tasks and ways to establish the outlook.

articles.title: K Holidays to Be Observed in South Africa and India
articles.content:
DPRK Holidays to Be Observed in South Africa and India
 Pyongyang, February 5 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 was formed in South Africa on Jan. 29 and a national preparatory committee for celebrating February 16 inaugurated in India on Jan. 30.
					 The secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party and former Foreign Minister of India P. Shiv Shankar, chairman of the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, were elected chairmen of those preparatory committees at the inaugural ceremonies.
					
					 The South African preparatory committee decided to hold colorful events during the days from Jan. 30 to April 15 while the Indian preparatory committee planned to organize colorful events on the occasion of the February holiday.

articles.title: RPDC decide liberar al ciudadano estadounidense Robert Park
articles.content:
RPDC decide liberar al ciudadano estadounidense Robert Park
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ATCC) -- Como ya trascendidos, el organo competente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea detuvo al ciudadano estadounidense Robert Park quien entro ilegalmente en nuestro pais por la frontera septentrional y realizo la investigacion a el.
					Segun el resultado de la investigacion, Robert Park entro en nuestro pais por su mala vision sobre la RPDC.
					
					Tomando en consideracion el hecho de que el reconocio su mala conducta cometida y se arrepintio sinceramente, el organo competente lo perdono con magnanimidad y decidio excarcelarlo.

articles.title: Fui enganado por la demagogia del Occidente, confesa Robert Park
articles.content:
Fui enganado por la demagogia del Occidente, confesa Robert Park
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ATCC) -- Como ya trascendidos, en diciembre del ano pasado, el ciudadano estadounidense Robert Park fue detenido por haber entrado ilegalmente en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por la frontera septentrional.
					Mientras el estuvo sometido a la investigacion de un organo competente de la RPDC, se concedio una rueda de prensa segun su peticion.
					
					En la entrevista con el reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea, Robert Park dijo que llego a cometer ese crimen siendo enganado por los falsos rumores circulados en el Occidente, y continuo:
					
					  El motivo de mi entrada ilegal fue la erronea vision sobre la RPDC adquirida por la demagogia del Occidente para mellar la imagen de ella.
					
					  Los filmes como "Los hijos del pais secreto" y "El tren rumbo a Seul" y las publicaciones del Occidente propagan en gran medida sobre los "actos de violacion de DDHH", la "gran masacre", las "duras penas" de los cristianos coreanos, etc. que no existen realmente en la RPDC.
					
					  Esta absurda desinformacion sembro en mi, que soy un cristiano, el gran prejuicio sobre Corea.
					
					  Entonces, no supe que hacer y me limite a rezar y ayunar. Se puede decir que eso fue precisamente lo que pude intentar primero. 
					
					Pero, a medida que pasaba el tiempo, me llegaron mas noticias y programas sobre tal situacion insistiendo en que esta se empeoraba cada dia mas.
					
					   Tales noticias me inquietaban de manera indescriptible. Si muchas personas se murieran de hambre en los campos de concentracion y los cristianos estuvieran tambien en tal situacion, yo deberia morir junto con ellos.
					
					  Si logro ayudarles, ire al paraiso y en el caso contrario, al infierno.
					
					  Despues de esta reflexion,  tome por fin la decision de ir a la RPDC.
					
					  Cuando cruce la frontera, supuse que seria fusilado o encarcelado acogiendome a la propaganda erronea de EE.UU. sobre Corea.
					
					  Pero, cambie de parecer al ver la actitud con que los militares trataron a mi, que era criminal, en el momento de cruzar ilegalmente la frontera.
					
					No solo los militares sino tambien todos los que se habian reunido conmigo me trataron con amabilidad respetando mis derechos humanos.
					
					Yo nunca he visto antes a los hombres tan generosos como aquellos.
					
					Las personas de aqui me trataron de manera increiblemente amable y generosa. Y se preocuparon por mi salud mas que mis padres. 
					
					Estoy muy agradecido de ese gran afecto por mi.
					
					Durante mi estancia en la RPDC, he sido testigo presencial de otro hecho impresionante. Es que en Corea es asegurada la libertad de la religion, al contrario de la propaganda del Occidente. 
					
					Yo, que soy un cristiano devoto, tenia entendido que en la RPDC no se puede pensar en el rezo siquiera debido a la represion sobre la religion. 
					
					Pero, me di cuenta poco a poco de que estuve equivocado. 
					
					Nadie se oponia a mi rezo sin considerarlo extrano ni estropearlo.
					
					Por el contrario, me facilitaron las condiciones para que yo pudiera hacer oraciones todos los dias con sosiego.
					
					Me quede mas sorprendente todavia cuando me devolvieron la Biblia.
					
					Este hecho basto para que yo tuviera la certeza de que en la RPDC es garantizada totalmente la libertad de la religion. 
					
					Tal certeza se hizo mas solida cuando participe en la misa realizada en la Iglesia de Pongsu en la ciudad de Pyongyang. 
					
					Participe en esa misa en que estuvieron presentes el predicador y el pastor. Ademas, vi al coro que conocia el himno religioso. Esto me sorprendio mucho. 
					
					En este oficio me quede llorando emocionado al saber que en Corea hay las iglesias de la cristiandad como la de Pongsu y los cristianos. 
					
					Me he informado tambien de que en varias zonas de la RPDC se realizan las predicaciones y los cristianos leen la Biblia. 
					
					Supe que en Corea se asegura plenamente la libertad de la religion y las personas pueden leer y creer todo lo que quieran en cualquier momento y en cualquier lugar.
					
					 A traves de todos los hechos vistos y oidos,  reconoci que estuve malentendido de Corea y reflexione seriamente de mi crimen cometido siendo enganado por la demagogia del Occidente. 
					
					Si hubiera conocido que la RPDC respeta los derechos humanos de los hombres y les ofrece la libertad y que todos ellos llevan una vida feliz y estable, yo no habria cometido tal crimen.
					
					 Realmente, me quede impresionado, perplejo y avergonzado. Los habitantes de aqui me trataron con amor respetando mis derechos humanos.
					
					Yo pido sinceras disculpas al gobierno de la RPDC por el acto ilegal en que he incurrido por la mala comprension de la realidad de Corea. 
					
					Si yo hubiera sabido antes todo lo que he oido, visto y conocido aqui y la gentileza de todos los hombres de aqui, nunca habria cometido esa accion ilegal cometida el 25 de diciembre.
					
					Me arrepiento sinceramente de mi culpa y pido disculpas.
					
					Para purgar mi culpa cometida ante el gobierno de la RPDC, me esforzare en todo lo posible por dar a conocer correctamente todo lo que he experimentado a quienes piensan mal de Corea para que ellos tengan la correcta concepcion de esta.
					
					Como cristiano, rezare con afan por hacer que se logre cuanto antes la reunificacion y llegue la paz en la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: MINREX organiza encuentro de amistad con extranjeros
articles.content:
MINREX organiza encuentro de amistad con extranjerosa
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento (16 de febrero) del Dirigente   Kim Jong Il, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea organizo el dia 4 un encuentro de amistad con los miembros de la representacion de las organizaciones internacionales acreditadas en Corea.
					Al acto fueron invitados Jerome Sauvage, coordinador permanente ante la ONU y representante permanente ante el Programa de las Naciones Unidas para el Desarrollo y otros miembros de la representacion de las organizaciones internacionales.
					
					Y estuvieron presentes el vicecanciller Pak Kil Yon y otros funcionarios de la cancilleria coreana.
					
					En  la ocasion hubo discursos.
					
					Los participantes desearon buena salud al Dirigente Kim Jong Il y profundizaron el sentimiento de amistad departiendo sobre el desarrollo de las relaciones de cooperacion entre la RPDC y las organizaciones internacionales.

articles.title: Simposio nacional sobre hazanas de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Simposio nacional sobre hazanas de Kim Jong Il 
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 4 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el simposio nacional para asimilar profundamente las imborrables hazanas de mando del Dirigente         Kim Jong Il. 
					  Tomaron parte el secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, los funcionarios del partido, la administracion y las organizaciones de masas en el centro y localidades, y los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, prensa e informacion, de los organos de formacion de cuadros del partido y del sector de reliquia historica de la revolucion. 
					
					  En la ocasion fueron publicadas las disertaciones que argumentaron en detalles la grandeza de la guia del Dirigente quien hizo del ano pasado un ano historico a ser registrado especialmente en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera. 
					
					  Los oradores senalaron que la proeza inmortal del Dirigente es que con su extraordinaria capacidad politica, el registro grandes saltos poniendo de manifiesto la potencia espiritual de todos los militares y civiles, e hizo que en todo el pais se desarrollara una vigorosa campana para conquistar la cumbre tecnologica.
					
					  El modo de direccion sobre el terreno, creado y practicado por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, se materializa con brillantes hoy en una nueva altura por la intensisima marcha forzada del Dirigente y sirve de la fuente fundamental de todos los milagros que se crean, apuntaron. 
					
					  Al fortalecer el ejercito revolucionario, -dijeron- el Dirigente puso a Corea en la posicion de la potencia a que nadie se atreve a atacar, aseguro firmemente con el poderio militar la marcha de gran auge de nuestro pueblo y puso a los militares del ejercito popular en la primera linea de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera para que ellos crearan la velocidad de Huichon, la nueva de Chollima que acorta el siglo. 
					
					  Ademas, elogiaron que el Dirigente es el gran maestro de mando, quien abrio la era de gran prosperidad de la cultura revolucionaria del Songun que estimula energicamente la ofensiva general de todos los militares y civiles, y es el politico nunca visto que exalto a todo el mundo la dignidad y la fuerza nacional de Corea del Songun con la bandera de la independencia en alto. 
					
					  Subrayaron la necesidad de asimilar profundamente y glorificar las imborrables hazanas del Dirigente y lograr un cambio decisivo en la vida del pueblo en este ano del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.

articles.title: Futbolista prometedor Hong Yong Jo
articles.content:
Futbolista prometedor Hong Yong Jo
						
Pyongyang, 5 de febrero (ATCC) -- Hay muchos futbolistas talentosos en la seleccion coreana que gano el boleto a la Copa Mundial de 2010 de la FIFA.
					  Entre ellos se destaca Hong Yong Jo (m) quien es conocido como excelente delantero entre los especialistas y los amateurs por haber marcado muchos goles en varios eventos internacionales y nacionales.
					
					  Desde su vida escolar en la primaria, tuvo mucha vocacion al deporte, en particular, practico con asiduo el futbol.
					
					  Aun en medio de la complejidad dada en el juego, el ocupa rapido y a tiempo la posicion favorable para anotar y concluye habilmente su ataque delante del arco.
					
					  Ademas, es diestro en el manejo del balon y muy sensible al momento de golear.
					
					  Su actuacion como uno de los principales atacantes ha sido lucida en los anteriores juegos internacionales.
					
					  En particular, anoto tres goles en dos partidos con Jordania que tuvieron lugar como parte de la tercera ronda de las clasificatorias asiaticas para la Copa Mundial.
					
					  En el ano pasado, Hong, capitan del once coreano, recibio el titulo de Deportista del Pueblo.
					
					  Son muy grandes las expectativas de las futuras actividades del muchacho en el escenario mundial del futbol.
